title: Kalaupapa National Historical Park: Donate
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Donate            Donate      Thank you for your interest in supporting Kalaupapa National Historical Park!  Public support is an essential element in the management, preservation, and protection of National Park Service lands. No other federal agency relies as heavily on the generosity and kindness of its visitors. To make a donation to the park, you may contact the Superintendent by phone (808-567-6802) or via email at KALA_Administration@nps.gov. Donations may be sent to:SuperintendentKalaupapa National Historical Park P.O. Box 2222Kalaupapa, HI 96742Please make checks payable to the National Park Service.
